DataElement.preferredName: Patient Screening Test Timeline Compliance Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text term to signify whether or not a patient has had any in a specified set of screening tests completed in the time frame required. [Manually-curated]

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._Checking for disease when there are no symptoms._A procedure for critical evaluation; a means of determining the presence, quality, or truth of something._A chronological schedule of when activities or events occurred or will occur._Voluntary cooperation of the patient in following a prescribed regimen.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.:Checking for disease when there are no symptoms.:A procedure for critical evaluation; a means of determining the presence, quality, or truth of something.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.
The use of any device, marker, or other means for the purpose of detecting the presence of disease, usually in asymptomatic individuals.
A procedure for critical evaluation; a means of determining the presence, quality, or truth of something.

Property.preferredDefinition: A chronological schedule of when activities or events occurred or will occur.:Voluntary cooperation of the patient in following a prescribed regimen.

Concepts.definition: A chronological schedule of when activities or events occurred or will occur.
Voluntary cooperation of the patient in following a prescribed regimen.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Specification of human conditions relevant to cancer. This includes observations, test results, history, and other concepts relevant to characterization of human cancer-related conditions. Non-neoplastic conditions of interest are also included.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Indicator of Yes or No to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.changeDescription: Updated to add NCIt concept relationship. Updated VM Short Name to be the Public ID to be consistent with current convention for VM Short Name - DW 10-03-2022
ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.29 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. ak

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.29 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. ak

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Has the patient had any recom
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient had any recommended screening tests completed in the time frame listed?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the patient have a routine screening exam for cancer within the past 6 months
